Blessings & strength to all!

Posts.Content: Dec 30, 2018 05:37AM BC2chick71 wrote: Ter1975, My recurrence score was 27, almost double than my first diagnosis of 14, tamoxifen didn't work. Hubby and I prayed and the MO recommended ovaries out (er pr + her2- (first time in 2016 no chemo or rads) I had dmx with diep flap. 12 hr long surgery with less that 1% chance of it returning!!! I feel good about my decision. I was iffy at first. But I'll do what it takes for it not to come back. Rick on sisters! We got this! So thankful for the group!
Posts.Title: Chemo starting December 2018 LillianGish nanette7fl

Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2018 10:07AM BC2chick71 wrote: hey there, Been waiting for this group. I'm putting my game face on as well. I'm scared but we gotta do what we gotta do to kick cancers butt!! I'm here after a DMX with immediate diep flap in 2016. Recurrence Oct 1st, 2018, lumpectomy Oct 24th. Redid my oncotype dx & it spiked upwards from 14 to 27. Original tumor was 7cm. My chemo treatment will be TC every 3 weeks for 12 weeks, then rads everyday for 6 weeks.
